snippet: Reports circulated widely on Wednesday that Wang Lijun, known for busting gangs in the western city of Chongqing, had tried to defect to the United States.
abstract: China’s social media are filled with speculation about the fate of Wang Lijun, a onetime rising star in the western megacity of Chongqing, where he had been the deputy mayor overseeing public security; reports say that Wang, one of the country’s most famous crime fighters, had tried to defect to the United States.
lead_paragraph: Reports circulated widely on Wednesday that Wang Lijun, known for busting gangs in the western city of Chongqing, had tried to defect to the United States.

headline.seo: Wang Lijun, Crime Fighter, Is Said to Have Tried to Defect
headline.main: On Social Media, Chinese Ponder Crime Fighter’s Fate
headline.print_headline: On Social Media, Chinese Ponder Crime Fighter’s Fate
